main.name: Ghulam Mustafa
main.description: Passionate and confident individual who loves to take challenges and explore new things.
main.bio: Greetings, I am a passionate software engineer having around 5 years of working experience in providing IT services to many local and international clients. I possess adequate experience to become a part of the software development stages such as designing, developing and testing. Exploring and learning new things, passionate about developing web and mobile apps, active presence in social communities, always eager to know about new tech and trends related to computer science. A passionate and enthusiastic person who like to meet new people and love to cater different challenges and solve them through my abilities.
main.contactmessage: DISCUSS A PROJECT OR JUST WANT TO SAY HI? MY INBOX IS OPEN FOR ALL.

resume.skillmessage: Some of the languages, frameworks/libraries which I have used.

education.description: Gained knowledge about trend and strategies in IT market, clearing required courses with 3.00 GPA
Cleared high school subjects and secured A grade

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed and optimized cross-platform applications, improving performance and user engagement across investor dashboards.
Implemented secure authentication, portfolio tracking, and real-time data sync features across mobile and web platforms.
Enhanced UI/UX consistency and responsiveness across devices, reducing app crashes and improving overall reliability.

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed high-impact features for Udhaar Book, improving digital ledger management for 100K+ users.
Enhanced app performance, reducing load times by 40%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ship feature updates monthly, improving customer retention.

work.title: Mobile App Developer
description: Managing Unilever’s core retail app, ‘Roll’, facilitating thousands of orders daily from retailers.
Ensuring 99.9% app uptime, improving retailer experience.
Implemented new features and optimizations, increasing user engagement by 30%.

work.title: Full stack Developer
description: Built and optimized React Native apps for retailers, pickers, and drivers, handling 10K+ daily orders.
Developed scalable backend services using Node.js and PostgreSQL, reducing API response time by 50%.
Improved mobile app reliability, reducing crash rates from 5% to 2%.

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Delivered React Native and Node.js solutions for multiple client projects, enhancing customer experience.
Built highly interactive UIs, leading to a 25% increase in user engagement.
Collaborated on cross-functional teams, improving code efficiency.

work.title: MERN Stack Developer
description: Worked on multiple freelance projects using ReactJS, Redux, React Native, and Expo CLI
Delivered solutions across the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js)
Developed scalable and robust web and mobile applications for diverse clients

work.title: ReactJS Developer
description: Developed and optimized ReactJS applications with Redux, improving frontend performance by 30% and reducing rendering times
Designed and managed DynamoDB databases, optimizing queries to handle 10K+ daily requests with low latency
Built and deployed AWS Lambda functions, reducing backend processing time by 40% and cutting infrastructure costs by 25% through serverless optimizations.

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed and deployed React/React Native applications, used by thousands of users.
Built RESTful APIs with Koa.js & PostgreSQL, improving data processing efficiency by 40%.
Streamlined development workflows using Swagger API documentation and Trello project tracking.

testimonials.text: Very responsive to communication. Delivery was well within expectations. Some very good , prudent, improvement suggestions were made that made the app better. Quality was excellent.
After a pleasant previous experience I was happy to return with more work. Delivery was quick and quality of work was good. Recommend!
